title: RP points trouble
body: I bought both the Star Guardian skins for Jinx and Janna with my RP points, but it only charged me for Janna. I didn't see an option to report it on the riot website. So I thought I'd put it here.

replies.body: Thanks for the report!  Sometimes an account can lose sync with their balance, and won't show updated information.  Normally, a relog will fix this up!  Hope that helps if something like this happens again!
NVM!, it corrected itself about 15 min later, but I will leave this up in case it is a problem for others.
